resources.string: Step 1: Enter the current testing location (kitchen, bedroom, etc.) then click SUBMIT:
Step 2: Select 5 different sounds.\nFor each sound, choose either option:
YOUR CHOICE: Record 5 samples and provide a name. Each sample is 1 second long. (Scroll right to see all 5 "Record" boxes) \n\nPRE-DEFINED: Choose a sound from a list of 9 provided sounds.

string.name: tutorial_4
string.font: Complete the steps above before training the model

string.name: tutorial_5
string.font: Click on "Evaluate" to predict your sounds

resources.string:
1. To train new data, tap on "Train"
 User is required to complete all the steps before training data.
 User has to provide 5 sounds, either by choosing YOUR CHOICE or PRE-DEFINED option.
 		YOUR CHOICE: the app provides 5 "Record" and 5 "Playback" boxes. A "Record" box records for 1 second using microphone, while a "Playback" box lets user hear back what has been recorded.
 		PRE-DEFINED: user chooses from a list from 9 provided sounds.
 

 2. To predict your sounds, tap on "Evaluate"

User is required to train data first before evaluating their sounds.
 By tapping on the microphone icon, the app records and returns query result after every 3-second sound.
 (Note: this does not mean the app continuously returns result every 3 seconds. If a sound is 3-second long then the app will return the result after 3 seconds. If a sound is only 2-second long, the app has to listen for another second before returning the result)


 A few notes about the current app (to be fixed in future updates)

Be sure to enter all information on tab "Train" and complete training before switching to other tabs. Otherwise, the information on "Train" is lost and has to be entered again.
